data.text:
Country: US

Technical: col 114m

Director: Alan Rudolph

Cast: Julie Christie, Nick Nolte, Lara Flynn Boyle, Jonny Lee Miller

Synopsis:

Two unhappy couples become involved in each other's lives when the husband of one of them, a handyman, calls to do a job at the other's house.

Review:

Sounds like the scenario of a porno movie, admittedly, but what emerges is on the contrary a nuanced and adult, in the true sense, exploration of what drives relationships, with a welcome comeback performance from Christie.
